general.gigTitle: design and develop a top quality website or ecommerce

sellerCard.description:
I am Francesco Gallo, 15+ years experience creative director and graphic designer.

Since 2009 I have been collaborating with a team specialized in social media strategy, visual identity, web design and web development.
Some of our works can be found on circuits such as Awwwards, Css Design Awards and Css Winner.

description.content:
If what you are looking for is a high-end professional website, a unique website designed with attention to every single detail, you are in the right place!


Hello and welcome, I'm Francesco and since 2009 my team and I have designed 100+ professional websites and collaborated with dozens of brands and agencies.

Many of our works can be found under the "ILAB" label on circuits such as Awwwards, Css Design Awards and Css Winner.



About the project:

Whether it's a landing page or an e-commerce, the goal is to engage your users with an excellent experience that fully represents your brand. We will do it step by step through:


  1. Let's talk about Your Project - what do you expect? who is it designed for?
  2. Moodboard & Concept Proposal - here's what we have in mind.
  3. Design, Development and Revisions - everything takes shape.
  4. Uploading Content - all those provided, even in multi languages.
  5. Test and Online - ready to go!
  6. 1 Week Training and support.



Please Note: if you need any special feature can be developed on request.


For more information or any curiosity feel free to contact me for a chat!

It will be a pleasure to give you all the information you need.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What does "pixel-perfect website" mean?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Like a tailored suit, the website will be designed in every single aspect: from micro-interactions to the mouse cursor aspect, from page transitions to loading times, nothing is left to chance.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are domain and hosting included?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, we prefer to let customers choose the providers they prefer. Obviously we are always available to evaluate together the best solution for the success of the project!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What content should I provide you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
What we need is your logo (or brand manual), website copy (if you want also in multilingual) and whatever photos you want to insert. If you prefer we can help you with the choice of professional stock images.

Remember, for a good result it is very important to use high quality content.

packageList.title: PIxel-Perfect One Page Site
packageList.description: Ideal for landing pages or small projects with big style. Contact form and manageable content.

customExtras.buyerTooltip: create and communicate the sitemap of the website to Google.
customExtras.label: Google Fast Indexing

customExtras.buyerTooltip: offer support and perform security updates monthly for 3 months.
customExtras.label: 3mo Update & Support

packageList.title: Pixel-Perfect Website
packageList.description: Everything you expect from a website. A custom designed user experience and manageable content.

packageList.title: Pixel-Perfect eCommerce
packageList.description: A shop designed pixel by pixel. Sell your products with a totally immersive user experience.

reviews.comment: We've been working with Francesco and his team for the last 2 years and they haven't disappointed us once. We're excited to have them on board for our new project, Clothy, and look forward to continuing this successful partnership!

seller_response.comment: It's always a pleasure and a fantastic opportunity to take part in one of your projects!

reviews.comment:
I recently engaged Francesco to update our logo and create a new website for our business, and I couldn't be happier with the results. Francesco's work is nothing short of incredible. His attention to detail and creativity shine through in every aspect of the project. He not only met but exceeded our expectations.

Francesco's ability to capture the essence of our brand and translate it into a visually stunning 

If I ever have similar design or web development needs in the future, I would not hesitate to hire him again. His professionalism, expertise, and dedication to his craft are commendable.

I wholeheartedly recommend Francesco for any design or web-related projects. Thank you!

seller_response.comment:
Ciao Alessio,

thank you for the opportunity and for being present throughout the entire project.

It was a pleasure to collaborate with you and your entire team and above all, the result was extremely satisfying.

I hope to meet you again in the future!

reviews.comment:
The seller was great, communicated well, and responded quickly. This is my second order with Francescogallo_ and both experiences were excellent, with top-quality delivery and going above and beyond to ensure we are satisfied. Even gave support after our website delivery was completed. He understood exactly what we wanted and delivered accordingly.

I am very happy and will definitely order again. Thank you!

seller_response.comment:
A good result is always the result of excellent teamwork.

Thank you for your trust and hope to cooperate with you soon!
